SELECT

SELECT

select * from dj_clue WHERE data_status=0 and stage IN (0,1) and CONCAT(owername,phone,wechat) like CONCAT('%',#{values},'%')

select
from dj_clue WHERE data_status=0
and label_id like CONCAT('%',#{label},'%')
and CONCAT(owername,phone) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
and stage=4
and stage in (0,1)
and user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY create_date
desc

SELECT
owername as name,phone,modify_date as modifyDate
if(m.name is not null,m.nick_name,m.name) as name, m.mobile as phone, modify_date as modifyDate, CONCAT(IFNULL(residential,'*'),IFNULL(building,'*栋'),IFNULL(unit,'*单元'),IFNULL(number,'*号')) as houseName
FROM dj_clue c
WHERE c.data_status = 0 and c.stage NOT IN (2,3) and c.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY c.modify_date desc
INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.member_id=c.member_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.member_id = m.member_id and h.data_status =0 and h.visit_state =1 WHERE m.data_status = 0 and c.data_status = 0 and c.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY h.modify_date desc
INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.member_id=c.member_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.member_id = m.member_id and h.data_status =0 and h.visit_state =3 WHERE m.data_status = 0 and c.data_status = 0 and c.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY h.modify_date desc
limit 1

SELECT count (0) FROM dj_FROM dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_member m ON m.member_id=c.member_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.member_id = m.member_id and h.data_status =0 and h.visit_state =1 WHERE m.data_status = 0 and c.data_status = 0 and c.user_id=#{userId} and date_format(h.modify_date,'%Y-%m')=#{time}

SELECT m.id as memberId, c.id as clueId, h.id as houseId, CONCAT(IFNULL(h.residential,'*'),IFNULL(h.building,'*栋'),IFNULL(h.unit,'*单元'),IFNULL(h.number,'*号')) as houseName, m.mobile, if(m.name is not null,m.nick_name,m.name) as name, h.create_date as createDate, h.completed_date as completedDate FROM dj_clue c INNER JOIN dj_member m ON c.member_id=m.id INNER JOIN dj_member_customer mc ON m.id=mc.member_id INNER JOIN dj_house h ON mc.member_id=h.member_id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} AND mc.stage=4
AND h.visit_state=1
AND h.visit_state=3
AND CONCAT(m.name,m.mobile,h.residential) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
ORDER BY h.create_date
ORDER BY h.completed_date
desc
